      • show

        void show(int resId,
          boolean infinite)
   throws java.io.IOException
        Show full screen GIF from resource
        Parameters:
        resId - the resource id
        infinite - true means infinity, false means play once.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • show

        void show(java.io.File file,
          int width,
          int height,
          int gravity,
          boolean infinite)
   throws java.io.IOException
        Show GIF from file with customized layout
        Parameters:
        file - GIF file
        width - the width for the showing view
        height - the height for the showing view
        gravity - the gravity for the showing view, see Gravity
        infinite - true means infinity, false means play once.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        params - the layout params of WindowManager.LayoutParams
